item.title: When AI Agents Go Rogue: Agent Session Smuggling Attack in A2A Systems
item.author: Jay Chen and Royce Lu
item.content:encoded: Agent session smuggling is a novel technique where AI agent-to-agent communication is misused. We demonstrate two proof of concept examples.

item.title: ISC Stormcast For Friday, October 31st, 2025 https://isc.sans.edu/podcastdetail/9680, (Fri, Oct 31st)

item.content:encoded: This week, I noticed some new HTTP request headers that I had not seen before:
